mapper.select: SELECT T5.userNumber, boardCount, commentCount FROM (SELECT T1.userNumber, COUNT(T2.boardNumber) AS boardCount FROM userTable AS T1 LEFT JOIN boardTable AS T2 ON T1.userNumber = T2.userNumber GROUP BY T1.userNumber) AS T5 LEFT JOIN (SELECT T3.userNumber, COUNT(T4.commentNumber) AS commentCount FROM userTable AS T3 LEFT JOIN commentTable AS T4 ON T3.userNumber = T4.userNumber GROUP BY T3.userNumber ) AS T6 ON T5.userNumber = T6.userNumber WHERE T5.userNumber = ${userNumber}
